channel.title: Portfolio on Tanay Kashyap
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Tanay Kashyap

item.title: Python Project: Predicting hotel booking cancellations
item.description: In this project, we built a machine learning model to predict whether or not a customer cancelled a hotel booking. We will use a dataset on hotel bookings from the article “Hotel booking demand datasets”, published in the Elsevier journal, Data in Brief. The abstract of the article states This data article describes two datasets with hotel demand data. One of the hotels (H1) is a resort hotel and the other is a city hotel (H2).

item.title: About
item.description: Dreamer, thinker and believer. The world is a source of knowledge and data which cannot be consumed in anyone’s lifetime. Here I am trying to learn and capture as much knowledge as I can. While I like to keep jumping from domain to domain, I am immensely interested in programming, data science, finance, and an avid observer of rockets. Connect and contact me for any kind of help and support for staring out in my domains.
